text:
Asset List

References: 

- http://img14.deviantart.net/110a/i/2013/108/a/2/looseleaf_by_granturismoboy2-d6277pr.png
- https://bbb.hidden-street.net/sites/bbb.hidden-street.net/files/sites/global.hidden-street.net/files/eqs/shoes017.gif?1244624517

Character Sprite:

- Plain white piece of paper with simple face, lines for arms and legs, but with boots on feet
- Style: hand drawn; humorous, doesn't take itself too seriously

Animations:

- Idle 1 (default idle animation; includes blinking)
- Idle 2 (this animation occasionally plays when the character has been idling for a certain amount of time; i.e. sighing)
- Walk
- Run
- Turn around (for when the character is moving in one direction, and slowly transitions towards moving the other direction)
- Jump
- Crouch (folds himself in half)
- Walk while crouched
- Jump while crouched
- Climb ladder
